name: Crazy Appliances 疯狂电器
description: CRAZY APPLIANCES is a fast paced top-down shooter game! The elect robots are insane, heroes! Fight your way by using various weapons and powerful items to defeat them in different dangerous situation!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or superior Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 100 MB available space
